column4: Just upgraded to Hardy Heron, nv glx seems to be messed up, where it was working before with an nvideo 6150 card. Xorg.0.log error: (EE) Failed to initialize GLX extension (Compatible NVIDIA X driver not found)
I see I'm not the only one with nvidia problems with Hardy....
it worked fine in gutsy before your upgrade?
(EE) Failed to initialize GLX extension (Compatible NVIDIA X driver not found)
see if you see this error (what I see)
that shows you the error(s) in X

Just upgraded to Hardy Heron, nv glx seems to be messed up, where it was working before with an nvideo 6150 card. Xorg.0.log error: (EE) Failed to initialize GLX extension (Compatible NVIDIA X driver not found)
so you're not having any X errors if that was the only line that came back, you have a different issue
There are different lines, but probably linked to my trials and errors trying to get it back again....
Ah, I was wrong : this time, I have 800x600 NON accelerated.... :) Great!!!
If I boot 2.6.24 (or try to) with a new hardy heron upgrade, the kernel doesn't finish loading. In debug mode, the last line in dmesg is: /build/bbuild/linux-2.6.24/driver/hid/usbhid/hid-core.c
Anyone have vm(player|workstation) worky in Hardy?
Sorry, I had to leave to take care of my daughter.... Any luck with your Nvidia problem so far?
